00089 class EGS_SPHERES_EXPORT EGS_cSpheres : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00090 
00091 public:
00092 
00093     // construct some CONCENTRIC spheres
00094     EGS_cSpheres(int ns, const EGS_Float *radius, const EGS_Vector &position,
00095                   const string &Name = "");
00096 
00097     // destruct spheres from memory
00098     ~EGS_cSpheres() {
00099         if(nreg) {
00100             delete [] R2; delete [] R;
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00104     // method to determine which spheres we are in(between)
00105     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x);
00106 
00107     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x);
00108     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x);
00109 
00110     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00111                     const EGS_Vector &u);
00112     // howfar is particle trajectory from sphere boundry
00113     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00114             EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0);
00115 
00116     // hownear - closest perpendicular distance to sphere surface
00117     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x);
00118 
00119     int getMaxStep() const { return 2*nreg; };
00120 
00121     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00122 
00123     void printInfo() const;
00124 
00125 private:
00126 
00127     EGS_Float *R2;                // radius^2
00128     EGS_Float *R;                 // radius
00129     EGS_Vector xo;                // for conc-spheres, all centres coincide
00130     static string type;
00131 };
